transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello? Good morning sir, Pradeep ji se baat kar rahe hain Super Telecom se?
Executive: Ji ji boliye.
Customer: Haan Pradeep ji main Reena baat kar rahi hun IndiaMART se Priyanshu ke senior manager.
Executive: Ji ji.
Executive: Actually sir kal Priyanshu unke sath aapka services ko lekar ke kuch discussion hua tha aur uske baad aapke pass whatsapp pe ek feedback message gaya tha jisme aapne not satisfied de diya tha. To kuch matlab services ko lekar issue hai Priyanshu ke sath?
Customer: Dekhiye mujhe jo issue aa raha hai na bulk aa raha hai. Bulk mein koi buylead nahi mil rahi mere ko.
Executive: Bulk mein ek bhi buylead nahi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan aur jis din se ye laga lo meri ye website chalu hui hai na IndiaMART maine start kara hai. Ye laga lo jyada se jyada 10, 15000 ka order mila mere ko bas.
Executive: Haan aapke sath discussion hua tha na July mid mein.
Customer: Haan jitna bhi time ho gaya ho aap khud sochiye itna mahanga package lene ke baad 10-15000 ka kya hai batao.
Executive: Nahi nahi aapki baat se main agree kar rahi hun. Aapka jaise jo main category chal raha hai wo bonsai plant hai na sir aapka?
Customer: Haan bonsai palm tree date palm.
Executive: Palm tree, thik hai. Abhi agar main palm tree ki baat karun, bonsai plant ki baat karun aur even date palm tree ki bhi baat karun to hamare pass multiple bulk mein buylead generate ho rahi hai. Ab dekho kya hota hai buylead to generate ho rahi hai ab hamare pass 300 supplier available hai is category mein sir. To buylead jab koi bhi buylead IndiaMART pe post hoti hai to har ek supplier ke pass jati hai. Ab depend ye karta hai ki kaun se supplier usko pehle purchase kar rahe hain. Paanch logo se jyada koi bhi ek buylead nahi purchase kar sakta sir. To lead aa rahi hai but wo aapke consume karne se pehle sold out ho raha hai. Aapka minimum kya hai order value palm tree mein?
Customer: Ji?
Executive: Palm tree mein minimum order value kya hoga aapka?
Customer: Ek, 1 lakh se 2 lakh tak ka.
Executive: Ek se 2 lakh ka hai. Agar main baat karun dekho abhi maine jo buylead check ki hai aapke category mein wo 10000 piece ki bhi aa rahi hai palm tree ki.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Amroha se aayi thi. Dusra aapka palm tree ka aaya hai 1000 plant thik hai. Fir aapka date palm tree ka aaya hai 2000 piece ka Muradabad se thik hai. Fir ek palm tree ka aaya hai 5000 piece ka New Delhi se. Fir ek bonsai plant ka aaya hai 100 piece ka Ghaziabad se.
Executive: Fir aapka ek aaya hai 300 piece ka palm tree for garden ke liye aaya hai. To buylead multiple available hai bas thoda sa ek cheez aap mujhe ye clear karo ki lead aap individual use karte ho ya aapke pass koi aur bhi hai jo employee wagera jo system pe deal karta hai?
Customer: No no no no no. Main akela dekhta hun IndiaMART din mein kam se kam 8-10 baar main check karta hun.
Executive: No no no. Akele aap dekhte ho. Haan to wo problem kya aa raha hai na sir jab buylead pe aap refresh karte ho na us time pe lead aapko dikhti nahi hai. Purchase karne se pehle wo sold out ho ja rahi hai. Ek kaam aap main aapko batati hun kya karna hai. System pe aap available rehte ho IndiaMART pe kabhi bhi?
Customer: Nahi nahi system nahi only cell phone.
Executive: System nahi hai aapke pass? Only cell phone. Agar system rehta na to system mein aap auto refresh ka ek option aata hai wo aap download kar lete to auto refresh download karne se aapka ye benefit hota hai na ki koi bhi buylead aap jaise man lo buylead ke tab pe aapko bar bar refresh nahi karna padega. Wo automatically 5 second ya 10 second ka time period aap waha pe set kar sakte ho. Wo time jaise hi aap set karoge jitne bhi time ka 1 minute ka, 5 second ka ya 10 second ka us time duration mein wo auto refresh hota rehta hai aapka buylead. Usse bahut hi kam chances hote hain ki lead aapki sold out ho.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Ji to wo cheez system mein possible hai phone mein to nahi hai. Phone mein rahi baat to aapko ek kaam ye karna padega. Phone mein agar man lijiye aap 3 ghante ke liye ho available for example IndiaMART agar aap 3 ghante use kar rahe ho to aap har 2 se 3 minute mein ek kaam bas ye karna ki jaise man lo abhi aapne 1 ghante IndiaMART open kiya proper to waha pe aap ek kaam ye karna 1 se 2 minute ke duration pe buylead ka jo tab hota hai na usko refresh karte rehna sir.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Aap kuch mat karna jo buylead jaha likha hota hai buylead ya recent ke tab ko refresh karte rehna hai aapko.
Customer: Thik hai, thik hai.
Executive: Isse ye hoga na ki IndiaMART pe buylead har 5 se 6 minute ke duration mein post hoti rehti hai. Post hui, paanch log active hain alag alag system mein bahut log active rehte hain sir. Kai employee to aise hote hain IndiaMART pe kai customer jo apne 2-3 employee ko hire karte hain aur unke 2-3 employee alag alag device mein login karke baithe hote hain. Ek ek company ki main baat kar rahi hun. Jaise koi buylead aati hai turant contact by now kar diya lead sold out ho jati hai. Wo within a minute mein bhi sold out ho jayegi. To isliye main aapko bata rahi hun ki buylead ke tab pe bas aapko click karte rehna hai thik hai? Baki sir Priyanshu se to koi problem haan recent aur buylead dono mein se koi ek ya to recent ke tab pe click karte raho ya buylead jaha likha hota hai na uske buylead ke tab pe latest buylead pe click karte raho 2 se 3 minute mein.
Customer: Thik, thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai? Baki Priyanshu ki servicing se to koi problem nahi hai sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi madam koi problem nahi.
Executive: Thik hai sir actually jo aapne feedback diya tha na ye buylead ke liye nahi diya tha ye feedback Priyanshu ke regarding gaya tha. Aap dekho waha likha bhi hoga how was your interaction with your account manager Priyanshu. To waha pe aapne not satisfied de diya tha sir.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan to isko main close kar deti hun kyunki isme concern open ho jata hai IndiaMART pe. Thik hai? Main jab isko close karungi na to aapke pass dobara se feedback mil jayega to us pe aap satisfied mark kar dena sir. That will be also for Priyanshu thik hai sir?
Customer: Okay okay okay.
Executive: Thank you, thank you sir. Thank you so much for calling.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting enough buyleads in bulk.

- Dissatisfied with the value from the package.



Resolution:

- Explained how buyleads are distributed among suppliers.

- Suggested refreshing the buylead tab frequently.

- Recommended using auto-refresh feature on desktop.

- Clarified feedback was about Priyanshu, not buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide satisfied feedback after closing.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, refresh, feedback
